title: Budgie the little helicopter. - Volume 3.
brief_description: Budgie the little helicopter and his friends take part in five adventures. “Copters and robbers”: Budgie is determined to catch two crooks who want to steal a plane. “Daydreams and candyfloss” sees Budgie at the fairground rescuing a couple stuck on the Big Wheel. Budgie gets to visit the Arctic in “Flying in Arctic circles.” “Whats Bruin?”: Budgie finds a baby whale beached on the ice while visiting the Artctic. “Down on the farm”: the planes are called to help get the crops in and Budgie is called upon to save the day.
